Module it.polimi.ingsw.am43
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am43.View.GUI

Class DeployedController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am43.View.GUI.SceneController
it.polimi.ingsw.am43.View.GUI.DeployedController
public class DeployedController extends SceneController
Controller of the deployed Pane in the center of the screen. It manages the graphic display of the deployed situation of all the players, allowing the player to switch between them whenever he/she wants during the game.

      public void redrawAllDeployedPanes(PawnColor[] colors, int firstPlayer, int thisPlayer, ArrayList<CardSide>[] deployed)
      This method is used when loading an existing game. It redraws all the deployed sides for each player.
      Parameters:
